description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are the last remaining Robot on Mars. The Aliens have invaded destroying everything and everyone you have ever known. How many Aliens can you annihilate in 10 minutes before the Planet is nuked?!?
